name: 咲耶
text:
（ああ……やっぱり降ってきた
傘を持ってきて正解だったな）
trans:
(Aah,
it really did rain... I was right to bring an umbrella.)

name: 咲耶
text: （ん？　あの親子は……）
trans: (Hmm? That mother and child...)

name: 咲耶
text:
あの……すみません
もし、良かったら──
trans:
Um...
Excuse me, if you don't mind──

name: 咲耶
text: ふぅ……しばらく、ここの屋根を借りるかな
trans: Phew... I guess I'll wait it out for a while under this shelter.

name: 咲耶
text:
（……少し、濡れてしまったか
でも、傘を受け取ってもらえて良かった）
trans:
(...I got a little wet,
but I'm glad they accepted the umbrella.)

name: 咲耶
text:
（まだ赤ん坊だし……
お母さんも、風邪を引いたら大変だ）
trans:
(The child is still a baby...
and it'll be terrible if the mother caught a cold...)

name: 結華
text:
あれ？　さくやんも雨宿り？
三峰も仲間に入れてー？
trans:
Huh? Sakuyan's also taking shelter from the rain?
May Mitsumine join in?

name: 咲耶
text:
結華じゃないか
もちろんだよ。どうぞ、こちらへ
trans:
Why if it isn't Yuika.
Of course. Please, over here.

name: 結華
text:
やっぱり降ってきちゃったねー
事務所に着くまでは大丈夫かと思ったんだけど
trans:
It really came down hard!
Mitsumine thought that it'll be fine before reaching the office.

name: 咲耶
text:
服が濡れてしまっているよ
これで早めに拭いた方がいい
trans:
Your clothes are all wet.
Here, you should hurry and dry yourself with this.

name: 結華
text:
わ、ありがとう！
ちょうどハンカチ忘れちゃってたから助かったよ
trans: Wow, thanks! Mitsumine just so happens to have forgotten her handkerchief so you're a lifesaver.

name: 結華
text: でもさくやんは？　……って全然濡れてないね
trans: But what about Sakuyan? ...You're not wet at all!

name: 咲耶
text:
ああ。雨が降り始めて、すぐここに来たからね
ハンカチを使うほどは濡れなかったのさ
trans:
Ah. I got under here just before started raining.
So I didn't get that wet to need to use the handkerchief.

name: 結華
text:
そっかそっか、なら良かった！
……でも、さくやんが雨宿りなんてちょっと意外かも
trans: Is that so? Then that's great! ...But it's pretty surprising to see Sakuyan taking shelter from the rain.

name: 咲耶
text: フフ。どうしてそう思うんだい？
trans: Heh. What makes you think that?

name: 結華
text:
だってさくやん、毎朝天気予報見て、
傘とかちゃんと持って出そうなイメージだったし
trans: Well, Sakuyan seems like the type to check the weather forecast every morning and you would bring your umbrella when you go out.

name: 咲耶
text:
そうだね……
まあ、イメージ通りじゃないことも、たまにはあるさ
trans: I suppose so... Well, sometimes people aren't what you imagine them to be.

name: 結華
text:
んー……？
……おっけーおっけー、そういうことにしとこっか！
trans:
Hm...?
...OK OK, let's just leave it at that!

name: 結華
text: たまには、のんびり雨宿りもオツだもんね
trans: Well it's fun to take shelter from the rain once in awhile.

name: 咲耶
text: フフ、結華がそう言ってくれて嬉しいよ
trans: Heh, I'm glad to hear you say that, Yuika.

name: 咲耶
text:
それに、こうやって雨宿りをしていると
キミみたいな可愛い女の子に出会えることもあるから
trans: Also, when I take shelter from the rain like this, I get to meet cute girls like you.

name: 結華
text: あはは、さくやんは上手いなぁ
trans: Ahaha, Sakuyan you're so good with words!

name: 咲耶
text: クス。私は嘘をつかない主義だよ
trans: Heh. I make it my principle to not tell lies.

name: 結華
text:
やめてよー、王子に本気で来られたら
三峰なんてすぐコロッといっちゃうよー
trans: Oh stop it! If the prince got serious, Mitsumine will be done for in a flash!

name: 結華
text:
雨よ！　早くあがってくださーい！
三峰の心臓がもちませーん！
trans:
Oh rain! Please let up quick!
Mitsumine's heart can't take anymore!

name: 咲耶
text: フフ。この空模様では、まだまだ雨は止みそうにないよ？
trans: Heh. From the look of the sky, it doesn't seem like it'll be letting up any time soon.

name: 結華
text: あちゃー、三峰大ピンチ？
trans: Oh dear, Mitsumine's in big trouble?

name: 結華
text:
……とかまぁ、冗談はさておき
雨がやむまで、一緒にゆっくりしてこっか
trans: ...Well, leaving all the jokes aside! Let's relax and wait for the rain to let up.

name: 結華
text:
引き出し増やすために人間観察～とか、
こういう時こそやってみてもいいかもだし！
trans: How about we observe people to get more conversation topics? It's something we're allowed to do in times like these!

name: 咲耶
text:
ああ。そうだね
こうしてのんびりできるのも、貴重なひとときだ
trans: Yeah, you're right. It's also important to take it slow like this once in a while.

name: 咲耶
text: ……おや、どうしたんだい？
trans: ...Oh, what seems to be the matter?

name: 咲耶
text:
行き交う人々よりも
私の顔を見ている方が楽しいのかな？
trans:
Instead of passersby,
are you enjoying looking at my face more?

name: 結華
text:
鋭いねぇ
だってほら、水も滴るいい女が隣にいるものだから
trans: You're sharp! Well see, there's a breathtakingly beautiful lady right by Mitsumine's side!

name: 咲耶
text:
……そうかい？
フフ。ありがとう……
trans:
...Is that so?
Heh, thank you...

name: 咲耶
text: （雨、止みそうにないな……）
trans: (It doesn't seem like the rain would be letting up any time soon...)

name: 結華
text: ……さくやん、雨は嫌い？
trans: ...Sakuyan, do you hate the rain?

name: 咲耶
text:
え……？
どうしたんだい、急に
trans:
Huh...?
Why are you asking this all of a sudden?

name: 結華
text:
珍しく、王子の顔が曇ってるような気がしたからさ
この天気のせいなのかなーってなんとなく
trans: It seems like the prince's face is unusually gloomy, so Mitsumine thought that maybe it's due to this weather!

name: 結華
text:
まあ、そういうアンニュイな感じも
かっこいいんだけどね？
trans:
Well, this melancholic atmosphere
makes you look cool too!

name: 咲耶
text:
フフ……アンニュイ、か
結華は、人のことを本当によく見ているね
trans:
Heh... melancholic, huh
You sure are observant of others, Yuika.

name: 咲耶
text:
嫌い……というほどではないよ
そこまでの強い感情は持ってない
trans: Hate... well, not to that extent I don't harbor that strong of an emotion on it.

name: 咲耶
text:
ただ、傘で人の顔が良く見えないからかな
雨の日は少し、感傷的な気分になってしまうんだ
trans: Perhaps it's because I can't really see people's faces due to the umbrellas. Rainy days make me feel a little sentimental.

name: 結華
text:
へぇ……そうなんだね
感傷的な気分かぁ。さくやんはすごいなぁ
trans:
Oh... Is that so?
Makes you sentimental huh. Sakuyan sure is amazing!

name: 結華
text:
三峰だと、服が濡れちゃうとか髪がまとまらないとか、
せいぜいそういうレベルだもん
trans: In Mitsumine's case, it's either how her clothes are all wet, or how it's difficult to fix her hair just shallow things like that.

name: 咲耶
text: 結華も、雨の日は苦手なのかい？
trans: Are you not good with rainy days as well, Yuika?

name: 結華
text:
ううん、ぜんぜん苦手じゃない
三峰には、雨の日だけのお楽しみもあるし
trans: Nope, that's not the case at all! For Mitsumine, there are things to look forward to on rainy days like this.

name: 咲耶
text:
へえ、お楽しみか……
いったい、どんな素敵なことがあるんだい？
trans: Oh, things to look forward to... What wonderful things do you look forward to I wonder?

name: 結華
text: ……それが、実は傘なんだなー
trans: ...That is, umbrellas actually!

name: 咲耶
trans: Eh...? Umbrellas?

name: 結華
text:
そうそう、さくやんが好きじゃないって言ってた、傘！
三峰は結構好きなんだよね
trans: That's right, the things that Sakuyan said she doesn't like, Umbrellas! Mitsumine likes them quite a bit!

name: 結華
text:
だってほら、いろんな種類があるでしょ？
ビニールなのか、柄物なのか、大きいのか小さいのか
trans:
See, there are many different kinds of them, right?
Ones that are vinyl, patterned ones, big ones and small ones.

name: 結華
text:
そういうのって、その人の好みが出てくるとこだから
……ある意味、オシャレの一環、みたいな？
trans: Seeing them is like seeing someone's preference. ...In a sense, it's like part of dressing up, something like that?

name: 結華
text:
そういうのが見られて楽しいから、
雨もなかなか悪くないんじゃないかなーって
trans: It's fun to see things like that, so Mitsumine feels that the rain isn't all that bad!

name: 咲耶
text: そうか……確かに、結華の言う通りだね
trans: I see... you're right, it's as you said, Yuika.

name: 咲耶
text:
雨だからこそ、
その人の知らない一面を知ることもできる……
trans: It is due to the rain that we get to see the side we hardly ever see of others...

name: 咲耶
text:
雨でなければ、
見えない世界もあるというわけか……
trans:
So without the rain,
there's a whole world we'd be missing out on...

name: 咲耶
text: フフ。そう思うと、雨の日も悪くないね
trans: Heh. If you think of it like that, then rainy days are not that bad.

name: 咲耶
text:
ありがとう、結華
なんだか、新しい世界が見えそうだよ
trans: Thank you, Yuika. It feels like I was able to see a whole new world I was never able to see before.
